thread.title: BRIEF-National Oilwell Varco Says CEO Clay Williams' FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $12.7 Mln Versus $10.6 Mln In FY 2016

title: BRIEF-National Oilwell Varco Says CEO Clay Williams' FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $12.7 Mln Versus $10.6 Mln In FY 2016

text:
Market News March 30, 2018 / 8:24 PM / Updated 27 minutes ago BRIEF-National Oilwell Varco Says CEO Clay Williams' FY 2017 Total Compensation Was $12.7 Mln Versus $10.6 Mln In FY 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
